movies.title: L'ombre des femmes
movies.plot: Pierre and Manon are a pair of poor documentary makers, who scrape by with odd jobs. When Pierre meets young trainee Elisabeth, he falls for her, but wants to keep Manon at the same time. But the new girl in his life finds out that Manon has a lover. When she tells Pierre, the time comes for difficult decisions all round.
movies.simplePlot: Pierre and Manon are a pair of poor documentary makers, who scrape by with odd jobs. When Pierre meets young trainee Elisabeth, he falls for her, but wants to keep Manon at the same time. ...

biography.bio: Clotilde Courau was born on April 3, 1969 in Levallois-Perret, Hauts-de-Seine, France as Clotilde Marie Pascale Courau. She is an actress, known for La Vie en Rose (2007), L'ombre des femmes (2015) and Nuit noire, 17 octobre 1961 (2005). She has been married to Emanuele Filiberto di Savoia since September 25, 2003. They have two children.
biography.name: Clotilde Courau

biography.bio: Stanislas Merhar was born on January 23, 1971 in Paris, France. He is an actor, known for La captive (2000), Almayer's Folly (2011) and Dry Cleaning (1997).
biography.name: Stanislas Merhar

biography.bio: Lena Paugam is an actress, known for L'ombre des femmes (2015), Les malheurs de Sophie (2016) and Les vivants (2014).
biography.name: Lena Paugam

biography.bio: Vimala Pons was born on March 15, 1986 in Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala, India. She is an actress, known for Elle (2016), La fille du 14 juillet (2013) and Eden Log (2007).
biography.name: Vimala Pons

biography.bio: Even if theater has always been Antoinette Moya's prime activity (she has been in stage plays by such great names as Molière, Marivaux, Gorki, Pirandello, Jules Romain, Anouilh, Audiberti, Duras, Dario Fo, ...), the French actress is not averse to cinema. Agreed, her first appearances in the fifties and sixties are scant, but from the 1970's she has become a regular of Gallic movies. She can be a bit player, a character actress or even the female star : in Michel Soutter's interesting 'L'Escapade' (1974), and in Jan Saint-Hamont's mediocre comedy 'Qu'est-ce que j'ai fait au Bon Dieu pour avoir une femme qui boit dans les cafés avec les filles?', whose only distinctive sign is the longer than average title. Often a mother (Isabel Adjani's mum in 'L'année prochaine ... si tout va bien'/1981, Samuel Le Bihan's one in 'Jet Set'/1999) or a mother-in-law ( 'Coup de sang'/2006), she can also be spotted as a customer or a roadside diner cashier, a makeup artist or an estate agent. She is rarely crotchety or peevish (Michel Serrault's wife in Robert Enrico's very good noir 'Pile ou face'/1980). Most of the time she is next-door neighbor or your local shopkeeper, the good-natured person with whom you chat about one thing or another, with whom you deal only with safe unimportant subjects but who makes you feel you are still connected with the others. Antoinette Moya has a particular knack for making such characters credible, so true-to-life that viewers are unable to remember her name. On the other hand, she has been a very faithful follower of a director who is anything but federative, Jean Marboeuf. Her reward in 1994 was the very unexpected role of Eugénie Pétain, the wife of Philippe Pétain, the controversial historical figure, once the savior of France then a puppet in the Nazis' hands in old age.
biography.name: Antoinette Moya

biography.bio: Jean Pommier is an actor, known for L'ombre des femmes (2015), Wild Innocence (2001) and La jalousie (2013).
biography.name: Jean Pommier

biography.bio: Thérèse Quentin is an actress, known for L'ombre des femmes (2015), Le Chef (2012) and The Wanderer (1967).
biography.name: Thérèse Quentin

biography.bio: Mounir Margoum was born on July 7, 1976 in Clermont-Ferrand, Puy-de-Dôme, France. He is an actor, known for Rendition (2007), Ma poubelle géante (2009) and Par accident (2015).
biography.name: Mounir Margoum

biography.bio: Claude Desmecht is an actor, known for L'ombre des femmes (2015) and Les amants réguliers (2005).
biography.name: Claude Desmecht

biography.bio: Christian Cousquer is an actor, known for L'ombre des femmes (2015), Frontier of the Dawn (2008) and Amphitryon (2003).
biography.name: Christian Cousquer

biography.bio: Michel Charrel was born on September 13, 1936 in Tarare, Rhône, France. He is an actor and assistant director, known for Belle de Jour (1967), La femme infidèle (1969) and This Man Must Die (1969).
biography.name: Michel Charrel

biography.bio: Louis Garrel was born on June 14, 1983 in Paris, France. He is an actor and director, known for The Dreamers (2003), Love Songs (2007) and The Beautiful Person (2008). He was previously married to Golshifteh Farahani.
biography.name: Louis Garrel

biography.bio: Suzanne Szerman is an actress, known for L'ombre des femmes (2015).
biography.name: Suzanne Szerman

biography.bio: Jean Masini is an actor, known for L'ombre des femmes (2015), Let My People Go! (2011) and Chat (2013).
biography.name: Jean Masini

biography.bio: Robert Potsztein is an actor, known for Elle s'appelait Sarah (2010), L'ombre des femmes (2015) and Victoire, ou la douleur des femmes (2000).
biography.name: Robert Potsztein
